name: User Settable Max Current
description: Maximum current supported by hardware, settable by Terra Config app

name: Error Code
description:
0 – No error
Other values : see troubleshooting guide

name: Socket Lock State
description:
OR-value of :
0x001 – Cable connected to charging station
0x010 – Cable locked in charging station
0x100 – Cable connected to EV

name: Charging Current Limit
description: Current limit chosen by the charger based on the various condition which include the 4100h register value.

name: Energy Delivered
description: Measured transferred energy of the current charging session

name: Set Charging Current Limit
description:
Since the charger uses an internal algorithm for load management, the current limit which is set may not be same as charger’s load management decision. For this purpose, read back 400E register.
Charging session will enter Pause state when the current limit is less than 6A. After that when current limit is set above 6A, charging session will be resumed. The choice of 6A is derived from IEC 61851-1.

name: Lock Unlock Socket Cable
description:
0 – Unlock
1 – Lock
Make sure  no ongoing charging session prior to unlocking.

name: Communication timeout
description: Charger decides modbus communication is lost when no messages received during this time interval
